events.text:
I guess if you have a little bit of money and you're worried about all this stuff,
its probably not a great move to distract yourself with shallow entertainment?
like maybe you could invest in something? take a gamble, maybe you buy fucking
and it goes to the moon and you're good randomly for no reason.
Like thats what they tell you to do, as like "the safe move", save and invest for the future
but like, its just a casino with extra steps.
except now i feel like no one is getting houses and life stability
like all you can stand to win is your novelty plushie and a carmel apple
like great, thanks. I invested and saved and after 30 years i've made 1% more money and now I can almost afford to fill my gas tank with the difference.
or maybe you just fucking lose money.
like I have friends that tell me "yeah my investments tanked and I lost 15k over the weekend"
And all I can do is stare back at them with a blank expression and souless eyes cause I'm too exhausted to care about anything
